successes.title: Shadowrun: Hong Kong
successes.description: A Shadowrun cyberpunk cRPG set in 2056's Magically Awakened Hong Kong by the developers of Shadowrun Returns & Dragonfall.

Pledges.description: You're a friend of the project and want to stay in touch with all the updates and excitement.
* A DIGITAL copy of the Shadowrun: Hong Kong game for Windows, Mac, or Linux through your choice of Steam, GOG or Humble. Retail price: $20. (DRM-free versions available, too!).
* Also includes the Shadows of Hong Kong 4-5 hour Mini-Campaign!
* ALL THE MUSICS! Digital downloads of the SOUNDTRACKS from Shadowrun: Hong Kong, Shadowrun Returns, and Shadowrun: Dragonfall.
* A Desktop Wallpaper for desktop, phone, and tablet devices.

>>> STREET CRED
All of the above, PLUS:
* A DIGITAL MAP of Shadowrun's Hong Kong in poster resolution.
* An ORIGINAL SHADOWRUN E-NOVEL based on the characters and situations in Shadowrun: Hong Kong.

>>>SPRAWL GANGER
All of the above, PLUS:

* 2 DIGITAL REWARDS in 1! The SHADOWRUN 5th EDITION DIGITAL TOOLS BOX contains The Beginner Box AND the Alphaware toolkit. This tabletop gaming set is the easiest way to dive into the intrigue, grit and action of one of the most enduring role-playing settings of all time! Whether you're just getting into Shadowrun or you're a runner that's been hitting the streets since the 2050s, you'll find useful material for running any type of game.
The February delivery date is specifically in reference to the delivery of the 5th Edition Digital Tools Box reward.
>>>Special BONUS for Backers at the $35 SPRAWL GANGER Reward tier all the way up to* the $10,000 HBS LOVES YOU!<<<
>>>This INCLUDES everyone who has ALREADY CHOSEN this Reward Level!<<<
